block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: using "Play Tune" to play a series of notes with individual note durations

create a list to store the notes of the tune each note is a combination of 2 values - Note+Octave Cx,CSx,Dx,DSx,Ex,Fx,FSx,Gx,GSx,Ax,ASx,Bx where x is the octave of the note - 0 to 8 - duration (ms) lowest note is B0 highest note is DS8 e.g. E6 250 = E - octave 6 - duration 250ms DS6 250 = D sharp - octave 6 - duration 250ms
